channel.title: CVE Feed for JetBrains -- TeamCity
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JetBrains -- TeamCity

item.title: CVE-2024-41827|2024-07-23T03:55:52.194Z -- jetbrains -- teamcity
item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2024.07 access tokens could continue working after deletion or expiration

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2024.07 comparison of authorization tokens took non-constant time

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2023.11.3 path traversal allowed reading data within JAR archives
